# backIndicatorTransitionMaskImage

**Instance Property**

The image used as a mask for content during push and pop transitions.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backIndicatorTransitionMaskImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you want to customize the back indicator image, you must also set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/backIndicatorImage].

## Configuring the Back button

- **backIndicatorImage**: The image shown beside the Back button.
